attributes.action: Say NO to pedestrianisation of Norwich Street, Fakenham
attributes.additional_details:
As a Trader on Norwich Street we have proof that when the road was closed a few years ago, our takings went down considerably. 
I believe that is people can't drive thru the heart of our town, they will bypass it and this would do considerable harm to our town
attributes.background: A trader on Norwich Street wants to pedestrianise the street, which means it would be closed to traffic. I Believe this would harm our beautiful town

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Local roads are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
